results.title: Cluely
results.summary:
Here is a concise executive summary of the text in 9-10 sentences:

Cluely is an AI tool that provides real-time assistance by monitoring a user's screen and audio from calls. It is designed to be undetectable and invisible to others, ensuring seamless integration into work processes. Cluely can understand and respond to content on the screen, including code, slides, and documents. It can also listen to meetings in real-time without joining them, providing context-aware responses to questions. The tool is useful for various tasks, such as handling objections during sales calls and providing product information to non-technical sales reps. Cluely can also assist with solo deep work, such as studying, debugging, and researching, by responding to prompts and context. The AI tool is available for download on both Mac and Windows platforms. Cluely's features are designed to enhance productivity and change the way users think and work. Overall, Cluely aims to be a game-changer in the way people work and interact with information.

results.title: Cluely
results.summary:
Here is a concise executive summary of the text in 9-10 sentences:

Cluely is a platform that offers a range of features and pricing plans for individuals and teams. The platform is free to start, with a free plan that includes 5 pro responses per day and limited features. The Pro plan costs $20/month and offers unlimited responses, access to the latest models, and priority support. The Enterprise plan is customized for teams and includes advanced features such as single sign-on, user provisioning, and advanced analytics. Cluely's features include custom system prompts, conversations dashboard, and support for various models including GPT-4.0-mini and Claude-3.7. The platform is available for download on Mac and Windows. Cluely offers different levels of support, including community support and priority support, depending on the pricing plan. The Enterprise plan also includes customized onboarding and centralized billing. Overall, Cluely's pricing plans are designed to cater to different user needs, from individuals to large teams.

results.title: Manifesto | Cluely
results.summary:
Here is a concise executive summary of the text in 9-10 sentences:

Cluely is an AI-powered tool that assists users in real-time during sales calls, meetings, and negotiations. The company's mission is to help users "cheat" on tasks by providing them with answers and insights instantly. Cluely's technology monitors the user's screen and audio, feeding them relevant information in real-time. The company acknowledges that its technology may be perceived as "cheating," but argues that it's simply leveraging technology to be more efficient. Cluely draws parallels with other technologies that were initially met with skepticism, such as calculators and Google. The company believes that AI will redefine how the world works and that the most successful individuals will be those who know how to ask the right questions. Cluely argues that the future will reward "leverage" rather than effort, and that users should "start cheating" to stay ahead. As AI becomes ubiquitous, Cluely expects that its use will become normalized. By adopting Cluely, users can gain a competitive edge and stay ahead of the curve.

results.title: Careers | Cluely
results.summary:
Here is a concise executive summary of the text in 9-10 sentences:

Cluely is a company that is seeking innovators to join their team and build cutting-edge AI solutions. They are looking for talented individuals to transform the way people think. Cluely is offering various career opportunities in engineering, growth, and content creation. The company is based in San Francisco, CA, and most positions require on-site work. Available positions include Engineering Intern, Founding Engineer, Growth Intern, and UGC Creator. Salaries and bonuses vary widely depending on the position, ranging from $0 to $1M and 0% to 5% equity. The company provides a range of benefits and opportunities for growth. Cluely is committed to building the future through innovation and technology. Interested candidates can explore the available positions and apply through the company's website.

results.title: Cluely Support
results.summary:
Here is a concise executive summary of the provided text in 9-10 sentences:

The Cluely Support page provides assistance and answers to user queries. It offers a range of articles categorized under various topics. The most viewed articles are displayed prominently on the page. The content is available in English and can be navigated back to the home page. The support page is divided into several sections, including Getting Started, Personalize, Troubleshooting, Billing, FAQs, and Updates. The Getting Started section has three articles to help users get going with Cluely. Other sections, such as Personalize and Troubleshooting, have two articles each. The FAQs section has five articles addressing common questions. Overall, the Cluely Support page is a comprehensive resource for users seeking help and guidance.
